channel.title: Posts on noisytoot
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on noisytoot

item.title: Standard Attainment Tests
item.description: The fat Cats, Rats And Bats Sat on the SATs That sat on the Mats And liked Pats Then the Cat Who was called Pat Sat On the Mat With the Rat, Bat And SAT.

item.title: Smug Pug in Mug 3
item.description: The mug Was fug, The pug Was smug And the jug Was fug. The pug said "I am smug", The mug said "I am fug" And the jug said "I am also fug". When the pug got transferred from the mug To the jug The pug became fug, The jug became smug, And the mug became smug. The pug said "I am fug", The mug said "I am smug"

item.title: Smug Pug in Mug 2
New Newt
item.description: I knew A new Newt Who liked to hoot

item.title: The Dog Went to the Bog
item.description: The dog Went to the bog With a log And a cog For a jog

item.title: As Snug as a Bug in a Rug
item.description: As snug as a bug in a rug Or as a smug pug in a mug Or a fug pug in a jug You can pour the pug From the jug To the mug.

item.title: Shoe
item.description: There was once a shoe Who was pale blue He went to buy some cheese then he bought some peas He then put on his jeans and gave his friend some beans

item.title: The Cat Sat on the Mat
item.description: The cat Sat On the mat With the rat And the bat Who had a hat And was called Nat And was also very fat

item.title: The Ox and the Fox
item.description: The ox and the fox Were sitting on the rocks They found a box of socks They had a lot of locks

item.title: Primera Air Is Not a Bear üêª
item.description: Primera Air is not a bear üêª It flies through the air As if without a care And yet they do care Though not enough To plan adequate water supplies

item.title: Man From Estonia
item.description: Man from Estonia There was once was a man from Estonia Who said he had never felt lonelier Then he went to UK And since was OK That ex-lonely man from Estonia

item.title: Man With a Beard
item.description: There was an old man with a beard Who said it is just as I feared Two larks and a hen Who had a ball pen Just signed their name on my beard

item.title: Man From David Street 3
item.description: There was once a man from David Street He liked his chocolate treat He learnt how to rhyme And committed no crime That innocent man from David Street

item.title: Man From David Street 2
item.description: Man from David Street 2 Who wanted to go to the loo He took so long That he missed ping pong This mysterious1 man from David Street 2 1 2 David Street does not exist

item.title: Man From David Street
item.description: There was a young man from David Street It is someone you would like to meet His name starts from "R" He rides in a green car Guess who is this man from David Street

item.title: Person From Tallinn
item.description: There was once a person from Tallinn Who didn't much care for old Stalin He/she logged into root And started to toot That musical person from Tallinn

item.title: mq
item.description: A program that asks you maths questions, written in Perl 6, and licensed under the GNU GPL v3.0 This file is about mq version 1.3.2, but the installation instructions will install the latest version What is mq? mq is a program that asks you maths questions How to use? mq <mode> <max> Mode "level1" Addition, subtraction Mode "level2" Multiplication, division Mode "get-group" Get the group length Mode "get-max" Get the maximum number Optional named argument "disable-log" Disable the log file Example: mq --disable-log level1 10 Configuration file Where is the configuration file?
